title: Sampler, mid–late 19th century
medium:
Medium: wool embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
description: Spot motifs, floral borders, adn sets of initials scattered on the ground in different directions, including a bleeding heart, landscape scene with a house, and a large red cardinal.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, mid–late 19th century.
mid–late 19th century. Medium: wool embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-438.
